title: The Authority may impose a levy of not exceeding Rs
clause_text: The Authority may impose a levy of not exceeding Rs.1000/- per annum for every 100 Sq.Mt. of built-up area for the failure of the owner of any building mentioned above to provide or to maintain Rain Water Harvesting structures as required under these byelaws.
